name: Sesame Ginger Nourish Bowl
description: Prep rice in the Multipurpose or Round Steamer – it's fast & convenient. You can make these bowls ahead of time and you’ve got an easy, fresh, and healthy go-to for the week. The Sesame Ginger Dressing adds nuttiness, richness and a small zesty kick to pairs perfectly with steak and rice.

ingredients.name: veggies, your choice, cooked or raw
low sodium soy sauce or gluten free soy sauce

preparation: Arrange first four ingredients in four serving bowls.
tips: Swap Rotisserie Chicken or 5–6 oz (150–170 g) firm tofu for steak.
Add 1 tsp Broth Mix for each cup of water to layer complex flavour in your pasta, grains, and pulses.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: This is a perfectly balanced plate.
